basics.name: Ali Yilmaz
basics.label: Research Assistant - Istanbul Technical University
basics.summary: Istanbulite by birth, Bursa's past resident, and now back in the vibrant chaos of Istanbul. Navigated through Urban and Regional Planning BSc (2018), upgraded to Urban Design MSc (2022), and currently embroiled in the thrilling saga of a PhD at ITU while juggling the roles of a research/teaching wizard in Urban and Regional Planning. My compass points towards unraveling the mysteries of pedestrian dance, decoding spatial data symphonies, and exploring the urban macroform. A part-time geek, always in awe of the spatio-temporal ballet of city life.
